    • HELP AND SUPPORT

    Frequently asked questions

    Is E-vent free?

    Yes! E-vent is a free service. But you can support E-vent by using it as your advertising platform or by buying a Premium E-vent subscription.

    How can I invite the participants to my event?

    Participants must be in your friends list if you want to invite them to your event.

    What is the maximum amount of participants that can be part of an event?

    Currently there is a limit of 25 participants, for all free users. For Premium users however there is a limit of 1000 participants.

    What can E-vent be used for?

    The most common use case is finding a suitable time for a group of people. So, what kind of event could that be? Here’s a short list as an inspiration for you, but be sure: possibilities are unlimited.


    • All kind of business meetings
    • Dinner outing
    • Your white wedding
    • Easter egg hunt
    • Special events for customers
    • Glittering ball night
    • Birthday party of Grandpa
    • First class reunion
    • Getaway with your family
    • Ladies Night or Men’s Night with your besties
    • What’s your next event?
    • Photography excursions
    • Team off-site day
    • Garden BBQ
    • Ski vacation in a chalet
    • Weekend trip to a city
    • Kick-off meeting
    • Happy undertake with friends
    • Backcountry bike tour
    • Toddlers and moms afternoon

    How does E-vent earn money?

    We sell ads space and offer a premium product called Premium E-vent to corporations and other organizations.

    Why is Javascript required in order to use E-vent?

    Modern websites and modern browsers heavily rely on Javascript. In order to provide the best possible user experience there is no way around using Javascript.

    What are the system requirements for E-vent?

    All you need is a modern browser and Internet access. We support Microsoft Internet Explorer 10, Apple Safari 6, Google Chrome 25, Mozilla Firefox 19, and Opera 12. Older browsers may work, but we cannot provide user support for them.
